name: Flugels - New Neutral Creature
description: A new neutral creature based on No Game No Life's Flugel race. Also my first H3 creature ever. Credit for the model goes to codealdnoah.
author: Fire Paladin

chinese.name: 天翼种
chinese.description: 来自游戏人生（NO GAME NO LIFE）的全新中立生物天翼种，作者为Fire Paladin。该作品模型归功于codealdnoah。
